Name: manishrw
AboutMe:
I am an enthusiastic software engineer. I like to build and play with the new technologies. Currently working in Medibox R&D, Bangalore as Software Engineer, wherein I am involved with designing and developing scalable applications, providing solutions to proactively enforce security through out cloud infrastructure.

I've been associated and involved with computers through out my life. Amongst other things, I like to play sports(badminton, lawn tennis), read books especially motivational, read blogs and articles. I personally like to research on various topics especially those pertaining to science and technology.

I graduated from National Institute of Technology, Surat in Computer Engineering.

Specialties: Algorithms design and optimization Machine Learning Computer Security Web application development
